Comments_List: How to do research in a lab environment
Performed great research with the Pfefferle lab group
Learned a ton. Incredible experience to work with graduate students and see how to use multi-million dollar equipment and analyze results. Research has been a tremendously rewarding endeavor.
Yes, great way to get involved with research at Yale!
